channel.title: Two annoying bugs in my sever please help. All is appreciated
channel.description:
Well my server is p16 v1 which is basically WhiteScape. I've done many things to it but these bugs still stand out and I'd like them fixed.
1. When I use an object like a ladder, etc I climb it before I get to it. And I attack NPC's before I get to them. I still walk to them but I attack them before I reach them and it's really annoying. I can use a ladder like 50 feet away!!!
2. This one has to do with saving my players I guess. I have full character design working, etc but when I log out it goes back to default design. Like if I get blue shirt, black pants, etc it goes back to default when I log out. And also when I have a weapon emote for say a whip with it's attack style, hold style, run style etc it works but I have to re-equip it for it to work when I log back in.
Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:48:58 PM[/size][hr]Come on..

item.title: Two annoying bugs in my sever please help. All is appreciated

@SWAT wrote:

Kitno:

2. This one has to do with saving my players I guess. I have full character design working, etc but when I log out it goes back to default design. Like if I get blue shirt, black pants, etc it goes back to default when I log out. And also when I have a weapon emote for say a whip with it’s attack style, hold style, run style etc it works but I have to re-equip it for it to work when I log back in.

you need to loggout open the char file ,edit it ,save it and then logg back in.
and there are more styles in ur server there like 4 you need to change them all

Read full topic
